name: Horror show - Escape the mad house
name_original: Horror show - Escape the mad house
description:
Escape the horror show before they will find you!

You are trapped in a distance horror show and you need to find the quickest way out of there before your life ends.
The evil is lurking around the corners and you have no idea what to expect,
navigate yourself through the different rooms to find the best way out, use the switches to get some light ant tap the red door buttons to open.
What ever you do, don't let them find you!

Tune upp the volume on your device to MAX to get the best experience while playing!

No ads and no additional in app purchases
just 100% pure play with free lifetime updates.

Grab yourself a horror game bargain today!
